thread.title: 27th Annual Kwanzaa Celebration | Creative Loafing

title: 27th Annual Kwanzaa Celebration | Creative Loafing
text:
Event Scheduled
27th Annual Kwanzaa Celebration
Saturday December 28, 2024 02:00 PM EST
Cost: Free (Kwanzaa Village and ceremony); $40-$45, 8 p.m. performance
Disclaimer: All prices are current as of the posting date and are subject to change.
Please check the venue or ticket sales site for the current pricing.
Please check the venue or ticket sales site for the current pricing.
From the venue:
Total Dance/Dancical Productions, Inc. proudly announces its 27th Annual Kwanzaa Celebration.
Agenda
2 - 9 p.m.
Kwanzaa Village
4 p.m.
PAW Dance Presentation
6 p.m.
Kwanzaa Ceremony
8 p.m.
Girl, Why You Dance Like That?
Featuring “Girl Why You Dance Like That?” Fusion: From Africa to Hip-Hop, the event takes place on Saturday December 28, 2024 at the Southwest Arts Center, located at 915 New Hope Rd., South Fulton, GA 30331 at 8 pm.
The Kwanzaa Village, a marketplace of unique gifts and entertainment, begins at 2. pm. The Kwanzaa Ceremony begins at 6 pm. Both the Village and Ceremony are free and
open to the public until 9 pm. The cost of the 8 pm performance is $40 in
advance, $45 at the door.
[More information](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/total-dancedancical-production-present-the-27th-annual-kwanzaa-celebration-tickets-1044504269387?utm-campaign=social&utm-content=attendeeshare&utm-medium=discovery&utm-term=listing&utm-source=cp&aff=ebdsshcopyurl)
At [Fulton County Southwest Arts Center](https://creativeloafing.com/business-1622-fulton-county-southwest-arts-center)
